body:
HELP SAVE AN ANIMAL

Hi! If you have Twitter (I think Instagram works too), could you tweet a picture of you and your cat (or a cat) with the tag #GooseOGato ? Every tweet is a donation of R$1,00 to the Luísa Mell Institute, which rescues injured and / or at risk animals and helps them recover and get adopted! If you don’t have a cat (like me), please reblog to signal boost!

Now I’m tagging random people.

@mysteriousharmony @bi-hemian-rhapsody @buggachat @pansuggestions @peterparkerisntdead @parkrstark @losingmymindtonight @melodyspond @acomaflove @arachnaboy @bestofirondadfics @celaenasbae @downeysbitch @equipebrasil

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

summary: Captain Marvel Crowdfunding Campaign To Hold Free Screenings For Girls Top $60,000
title: Captain Marvel Crowdfunding Campaign To Hold Free Screenings For Girls Top $60,000
body:
Captain Marvel Crowdfunding Campaign To Hold Free Screenings For Girls Top $60,000

Credit: Disney

Captain Marvel will be the MCU’s first solo superhero film with a woman in the lead. It’s definitely a step in the right direction for the studio, who has been criticized for a lack of diversity in the past.

In the tradition of such films like Wonder Woman, Black Panther, and A Wrinkle In Time, people are getting together to make sure girls can go see the film. There’s nothing…

summary: some men are really out there boycotting captain marvel because they can't believe a woman can be a superhero too and have her...
body: some men are really out there boycotting captain marvel because they can’t believe a woman can be a superhero too and have her own movie, don’t y'all have enough movies with a male superhero as the leading role to be so triggered and not let other people enjoy and be happy to FINALLY have a movie with a female superhero as the leading role too? get over it, this is pathetic

summary: Captain Marvel's Brie Larson: 2019 is About "Intersectional Feminism"
title: Captain Marvel's Brie Larson: 2019 is About "Intersectional Feminism"
body:
Captain Marvel’s Brie Larson: 2019 is About “Intersectional Feminism”

Captain Marvel actress Brie Larson declared 2019 is about “intersectional feminism.”

In an interview with Entertainment Weekly, Larson responded to a question about Carol Danvers’ relationship with Maria Rambeau played by Lashana Lynch and her daughter and what theme she wanted to explore through their friendship.

Larson stated:

“I think because it’s 2019, and what 2019 is about, really, is…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson: "I Wanna be a Jedi"
title: Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson: "I Wanna be a Jedi"
body:
Captain Marvel Actress Brie Larson: “I Wanna be a Jedi”

Brie Larson declared her desire to become a Jedi and join the Star Wars universe in a new interview with Entertainment Weekly promoting Captain Marvel.

EW spoke with both Larson and Jackson for the upcoming Marvel Studios flick, where Jackson began discussing how his popularity soared when he portrayed Mace Windu in the Star Wars prequel trilogy.

” ’Cause I had all this interesting kind of…

View On WordPress
